content: For Chinese food, a good pairing option would be a Syrah or Shiraz from the Rhone Valley in France. These wines have a good balance of fruit and spice that can complement the bold flavors of Chinese cuisine. Some specific options in your budget range include Cote Rotie, Hermitage, and Crozes-Hermitage. Another option would be a Napa Valley Zinfandel or Petite Sirah, which also have bold, spicy flavors that would pair well with Chinese food.
